name: Hover Car Parking Simulator - Flying Hoverboard Car City Racing Game FREE
name_original: Hover Car Parking Simulator - Flying Hoverboard Car City Racing Game FREE
description:
Travel to the future and get in your hover car. In the year 2055, cars can now fly. Maneuver your thrusters to move your car down the road and park in the parking spot. Careful, other people, cars and even hover boarders can get in the way. It’s the most futuristic parking simulator yet.

Features:

- Realistic Hover Physics
- Interior and exterior camera views
- 3 Different hover cars to choose from
- One incredible open-world future city
